description: There is "no blank cheque-book for heritage" on the island, says Manx National Heritage director.
title: Historic former Isle of Man police station 'must pay own way'
title_page: Historic former Isle of Man police station 'must pay own way' - BBC News
maintext: "It doesn't mean to say they have to make a profit, but in the long-term they need a future which is sustainable", he continued.
